sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 15 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Complete once per day for one week.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### Worry parking lot
- Target bedtime: ______
- Wake time: ______
- Wind-down start time: ______

### Habits check
- Caffeine cutoff time: ______
- Screen-off time: ______
- Movement today: ______

### Stress reset
- One 3-minute reset I will use: ______
- If I wake at night, I will: ______

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- Invite the client to share highlights in session and reinforce skill use.
- Review patterns and adjust one habit at a time.
- Encourage realistic targets to reduce all-or-nothing thinking.
